v8:item.v8:content: Hide users that belong to child groups
User is removed from the group.
User was added to the group.
A user is considered active if they are valid and neither the user nor its user group are marked for deletion.
External user was removed from the group.
External user was added to the group.
An external user is considered active if they are valid and neither the user nor its external user group are marked for deletion.
